_xResult.title: Bora Linen Pants
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made long linen pants with straight-leg hem
_xResult.longdesc:
The custom made Bora pant is too cute to say no to. We love this version with the straight-leg cut, made simpler and streamlined for your figure. These made to measure pants are made from 100% pure medium-weight linen, already washed and softened to take out the shrink. 

 

These pants are customizable, so don't forget to choose your color and specify it during checkout.

 

Shantima uses only Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees to you that it meets human - ecological requirements. The fabric is already washed and softened linen and will shrink no more.

properties.propvalue: Gentle machine wash on low temperatures with soft washing agents. Machine dry in the most gentle way, please use cool temperature. Avoid overdrying.Â No ironing required to maintain relaxed and wrinkled texture.
